0pt\">3.<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -1.1pt\">국산 항체치료제의 변이주 감염자에 대한 치료효과 중간분석 결과</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">□ 국립감염병연구소는 국산 항체치료제(렉키로나주)의 변이 바이러스에 대한 치료 효과를 분석하기 위하여, 의료기관과 협력하여 환자를 대상으로 임상 연구를 진행하고 있다.</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ ’21.6월~’21.9월 동안 연구에 참여한 코로나19 고위험 경증~중등증 환자 대상으로 렉키로나주(셀트리온) 사용에 의한 중증으로의 질병진행률을 중간 분석한 결과,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 해당기간 참여 환자는 대부분 델타 변이 바이러스 감염자였으며, 델타 감염자 중 렉키로나주 치료는 중증으로의 진행률을 감소시키는 것을 확인하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * (중증 진행률) 델타 변이 감염자 중 대증요법치료군 15%(21명/140명), 렉키로나주치료군 5.6%(27/486명), p&lt;0.001</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 이 결과는 비교 대상 대조군과의 환자별 기저질환, 질병 중증도 등의 요인을 세부적으로 보정하기 전이므로 경향성 정도만 파악한 것이며, 추가분석을 통해 향후 최종결과를 발표할 예정이다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<div class=\"hwp_editor_board_content\" data-hjsonver=\"1.0\" data-jsonlen=\"12172\" id=\"hwpEditorBoardContent\" style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></div>\n<table style=\"border-top-style: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td class=\"NamoSE_border_show\" style=\"border-top: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; height: 42px; border-right: 0px; width: 638px; vertical-align: middle; background: rgb(253,254,235); border-bottom: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; padding-bottom: 1px; padding-top: 1px; padding-left: 1px; border-left: 0px; padding-right: 1px\">\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; word-break: 0pt\">4.<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.4pt\">오미크론</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: -1.1pt\"><span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -1.1pt\">변이 바이러스에 대한 치료제 효능 분석 결과</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 국립감염병연구소는 오미크론 변이 바이러스에 대한 코로나19 치료제의 효능평가 결과 등 진행 상황을 발표하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 세포실험을 통해 코로나19 항바이러스제인 렘데시비르*의 효능을 분석한 결과,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 기존 바이러스(GR)과 비교 시, 오미크론 바이러스의 유전자 변이에 영향을 받지 않고 항바이러스 효능이 유지됨을 확인하였으며,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 환자치료에 사용중인 렘데시비르(베클루리주)와 동일성분의 화합물 이용</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 항체치료제의 경우, 렉키로나 및 추가 개발중인 후보 항체와의 병합물질에 대하여 세포실험 및 동물에서의 효능평가를 수행 중이다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>1</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>차 접종은<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>‘2</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>차 접종</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>’<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>합계에도 추가</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>2</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>차의 경우<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>3</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -1.7pt'>차 합계에 추가</span></p>\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; line-height: 24px; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: 0pt'>※<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"'>상기통계자료는 예방접종등록에 따라 변동 가능한 잠정 통계임</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ (3차접종) 현재 3차접종자 수는 2,421만 명으로 1월 2주(1.9.~1.15.)에도 약 230만건 이상 접종이 시행되었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> * 3차접종자 수: (12.4주) 3,664,828명 → (12.5주) 3,267,345명 → (1.1주) 2,535,504명 → (1.2주) 2,315,499명</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 1월 말을 기준으로 접종간격 도래자(3,883만 명, 이하 “대상자”) 대비 3차접종률은 62.4%로, 연령별로는 70대가 94.1%로 가장 높았으며, 80대 이상이 93.4%, 60대 87.8%, 50대 66.1%, 18-19세 59.8% 순이었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 이번 달부터 18~59세 청장년층 및 중년층을 중심으로 접종이 시행되고 있다. 1월말 기준 대상자 대비 접종률은 1주간(1.13.~1.19.) 6.1%p(42.5% → 48.6%) 상승하였으며, 40대 연령층의 접종률 상승폭이 6.9%p(36.4% → 43.3%)로 가장 많이 상승하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 12월 중 집중접종을 시행한 60세 이상 연령층의 접종률도 꾸준히 높아지고 있다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">【주차별 3차접종 인구 및 대상자 대비 접종률(1.20. 0시 기준) 그림 붙임 참고】</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ (13-18세 접종) 13~18세(’21년 기준 12~17세) 청소년은 현재까지 219만 명이 1차접종을 받았으며, 인구 대비 1차접종률은 79.1%, 2차접종률은 69.5%로, 접종률은 꾸준히 상승 중이다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 16~18세의 1차접종률은 88.2%, 2차접종률은 81.5%로 높게 나타났다. 13~15세의 경우 1차접종률 70.4%, 2차접종률 57.9%로 16~18세에 비해서는 낮으나, 꾸준히 접종률이 높아져 1차접종률은 70%를 넘었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">【청소년 주차별 예약률 및 1차·2차접종률 그림 붙임 참고】</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 12월에 비해 1월 들어 접종률 증가폭이 상대적으로 둔화되었으나, 1차접종 3주 후 2차접종 시기가 도래한 청소년의 2차접종이 본격적으로 이루어지고 있다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ (미접종자 접종) 18세 이상의 1차접종률은 96.5%로 매우 높은 수준이며, 아직까지 접종에 참여하지 않으신 미접종자의 접종도 꾸준히 이루어지고 있다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 18세 이상 대상자 중 1월 1주에는 약 10만 명, 1월 2주에는 약 7만 명이 1차접종에 참여하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 1차접종자수: (12.4주) 253,524명 → (12.5주) 141,739명 → (1.1주) 101,910명 → (1.2주) 75,553명</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<div class=\"hwp_editor_board_content\" data-hjsonver=\"1.0\" data-jsonlen=\"11157\" id=\"hwpEditorBoardContent\" style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></div>\n<table style=\"border-top-style: none; border-left-style: none; font-family: 굴림; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; border-bottom-style: none; text-transform: none; border-right-style: none; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td class=\"NamoSE_border_show\" style=\"border-top: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; height: 38px; border-right: 0px; width: 631px; vertical-align: middle; background: rgb(253,254,235); border-bottom: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; padding-bottom: 1px; padding-top: 1px; padding-left: 1px; border-left: 0px; padding-right: 1px\">\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; word-break: keep-all; text-align: left; margin-left: 312px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: -234.2pt; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: 0pt\">6.<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M\">설 연휴 전 코로나</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: 0pt\">19 3</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M\">차접종 당부</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">󰊱 코로나19 예방접종 효과</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 중앙방역대책본부는 1월 1주차 확진자에서 예방접종력에 따라 중증 진행을 평가하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ ‘3차접종 후 확진군’*은 ‘미접종 확진군’에 비해 중증(사망 포함)으로 진행할 위험이 90.8%, ‘2차접종 후 확진군’도 ‘미접종 확진군’에 비해 80.2% 낮게 나타났다고 밝혔다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 즉, ‘미접종 확진군’의 중증화율은 ‘3차접종 완료 후 확진군’에 비해 11배, ‘2차접종 완료 후 확진군’에 비해 5배 높게 나타나, 돌파감염 등으로 접종 후 확진되는 경우에도 3차접종까지 마친 경우에는 2차접종까지 시행한 경우에 비해 중증진행 예방효과가 보다 크다는 점이 지속적으로 확인되었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">&lt;1월 1주 기준 확진자 중 예방접종력에 따른 연령대별 누적 중증화율 위험도 비교 그림 붙임 참고&gt;</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">󰊲 3차접종 필요성 및 진행 현황</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> (1) 60세 이상 연령층</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ (3차접종 필요성) 60세 이상은 코로나19 감염시 중증, 사망 위험이 높아 신속한 3차접종이 필요하다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 코로나19 유행의 안정세 및 60세 이상 연령층의 3차접종률 증가로 확진자 중 비중은 감소세이나, 위중증 및 사망 비중은 큰 변동이 없는 상황이다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림;
