height: 38px; border-right: 0px; width: 638px; vertical-align: middle; background: rgb(253,254,235); border-bottom: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; padding-bottom: 1px; padding-top: 1px; padding-left: 1px; border-left: 0px; padding-right: 1px\">\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; word-break: keep-all; text-align: left; margin-left: 312px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: -234.2pt; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: 0pt\">9.<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.4pt\">예방접종 피해조사반의 이상반응 사례평가 결과 분석<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.4pt\">(~1.14.)</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 예방접종피해조사반(반장 서은숙 교수)은 현재까지 총 46차례 회의를 개최하여 코로나19 예방접종 후 발생한 이상반응 신고사례에 대한 인과성을 평가하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 평가 상정된 총 4,725건(사망 1,250건, 중증 1,460건, 아나필락시스 2,015건) 중 744건(사망 2건, 중증 5건, 아나필락시스 737건)이 인과성 인정되었고, 80건(사망 11건, 중증 69건)이 근거 불충분한 사례*로 평가되었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 근거가 불충분한 사례는 3천만 원 이내의 의료비 등을 지원하고 있으며, 근거가 확보되면 재평가할 예정임</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 제 46차 회의(1.14일)에서 신규 158건(사망 44건, 중증 33건, 아나필락시스 81건) 및 재심 1건(사망 1건) 심의하였고, 이중 아나필락시스 32건이 인과성 인정되었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">[ 코로나19 예방접종 피해조사반의 이상반응 사례 평가결과(1.14.기준) ](단위 : 건)</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 한양중고딕; letter-spacing: 0pt\">⑷</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: 한양중고딕; letter-spacing: 0pt\">,<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: 한양중고딕\">급성심근심낭염</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">* 1건은 교차접종(1차 접종 : 아스트라제네카 백신- 2차 접종: 화이자백신)</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 예방접종피해조사반 제46차 회의(1.14일)에 제출된 신규 사망 및 중증 이상반응 사례를 분석한 결과,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 신규 사망 신고사례 44건의 평균 연령은 65.9세(범위 26~92세)였고, 이 중 38례(86.4%)에서 기저질환*이 있었으며, 접종한 백신은 아스트라제네카(6건), 화이자(20건), 아스트라제네카-화이자 교차접종(10건), 모더나(5건), 아스트라제네카-모더나 교차접종(3건) 이었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 고혈압, 당뇨, 고지혈증, 뇌혈관질환 등</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 신규 중증 신고사례 33례의 평균 연령은 60.1세(범위 13~87세)였고, 이 중 24례(72.7%)에서 기저질환이 있었으며, 접종부터 증상 발생까지 평균 소요기간은 7.2일(범위: 0.1∼58.6일), 접종한 백신은 아스트라제네카(3건), 화이자(20건), 아스트라제네카-화이자 교차접종(2건), 모더나(3건), 아스트라제네카-모더나 교차접종(5건)이었다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<div class=\"hwp_editor_board_content\" data-hjsonver=\"1.0\" data-jsonlen=\"10247\" id=\"hwpEditorBoardContent\" style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td class=\"NamoSE_border_show\" style=\"border-top: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; padding-right: 1px\">\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; word-break: keep-all; text-align: left; margin-left: 312px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: -234.2pt; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: 0pt\">10.<span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M\">오미크론 변이 확산에 따른 당부 사항</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"><span style=\"font-size: 10pt\">□ 중앙방역대책본부는 거리두기 강화 시행(’21.12.18.) 이후 확진자 발생은 3~4천명 대로 감소하였으나 최근 이틀 연속 5천명 이상으로 증가하였다.</span></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> * 3,551명(1.17.) → 3,762명(1.18.) → 5,805명(1.19.) → 6,357명(1.20.)</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 오미크론 변이의 국내 확산에 따라 바이러스 검출율이 26.7%를 기록하는 등 매우 빠른 확산세를 보이고 있다. 특히, 호남권‧경북권‧강원권은 30%이상의 검출률 보이고 있다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> * (오미크론 변이 검출률, 1.15.기준): 호남권(59.2%), 경북권(37.1%), 강원권(31.4%), 수도권(19.6%), 충청권(13.5%), 경남권(12.0%), 제주권(6.1%)</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 오미크론 변이의 경우 빠른 전파력으로 인해 다음주 중 국내 우세종화가 예상되고 있어 확진자 발생이 더 증가할 것으로 보았다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 따라서, 확진자 발생을 최대한 억제하고 발생증가에 대응하기 위해 기본적인 방역수칙 준수 및 신속한 예방접종 실시가 필요하다고 밝혔다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ ▲불필요한 모임‧외출‧집단행사 등 자제, ▲마스크 착용 및 손 씻기, ▲실내에서는 한 시간에 10분 이상 환기 실시 등 기본 방역수칙을 철저히 지켜주시고</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 또한, 아직까지 예방접종 받지 않은 미접종자 및 미완료자는 신속히 3차접종까지 완료해 줄 것을 당부하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> ※ 예방접종 중증예방 효과(1월1주): ‘3차접종 후 확진군’은 ‘미접종군’ 및 ‘2차접종 후 확진군’에 비해 각각 90.8%, 80.2% 낮게 나타남</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration-color: initial\">    8. font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>회 접종만으로 기본 접종이 완료</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>되므로 접종 시<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>‘1</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>차 접종</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>’</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>과<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>‘2</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>차 접종</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>’<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>통계에 모두 추가</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>하고</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>,</span><span style=\"font-size: 9pt; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt\"><span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>얀센<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>2</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>차의 경우<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>3</span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.2pt'>차 합계에 추가</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 중앙방역대책본부(본부장: 정은경 청장)는 1월 20일 0시 기준으로 재원중 위중증 환자는 488명, 사망자는 28명으로 누적 사망자는 6,480명(치명률 0.91%)이라고 밝혔다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: 0pt'>※<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"'>상기 통계는 모두 추후 역학조사 과정에서 변경될 수 있음</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"'>차 합계에 추가</span></p>\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; line-height: 24px; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: 0pt'>※<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 9pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"'>상기통계자료는 예방접종등록에 따라 변동 가능한 잠정 통계임</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<div class=\"hwp_editor_board_content\" data-hjsonver=\"1.0\" data-jsonlen=\"14002\" id=\"hwpEditorBoardContent\" style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></div>\n<table style=\"border-top-style: none; border-left-style: none; font-family: 굴림; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; border-bottom-style: none; text-transform: none; border-right-style: none; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td class=\"NamoSE_border_show\" style=\"border-top: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; height: 38px; border-right: 0px; width: 638px; vertical-align: middle; background: rgb(253,254,235); border-bottom: rgb(0,0,255) 1px solid; padding-bottom: 1px; padding-top: 1px; padding-left: 1px; border-left: 0px; padding-right: 1px\">\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; word-break: keep-all; text-align: left; margin-left: 312px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: -234.2pt; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: 0pt\">2.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\"><span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">방역패스</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">(</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">접종증명</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">·</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">음성확인제</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">)</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\"><span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: HY헤드라인M; letter-spacing: -0.3pt\">예외확인서 대상 확대</span></p>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">□ 중앙방역대책본부(본부장 정은경 청장)는 1월 24일(월)부터 방역패스(접종증명·음성확인제)의 의학적 사유에 의한 적용 예외 범위를 코로나19 백신 접종 후 이상 반응 의심 증상이 나타나 입원 치료를 받은 경우 등으로 확대한다고 밝혔다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 다만, 방역패스 예외 범위 인정이 백신 접종과 이상 반응의 인과성 및 피해보상의 필요성 또는 접종 금기를 의미하는 것은 아니며,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 단계적 일상회복 과정에서 방역패스가 영업 제한 등 강력한 사회적 거리두기의 대체 수단으로 다중이용시설 전반에 확대됨에 따라,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 접종을 받으려고 노력했으나, 접종 후 이상 반응으로 접종을 완료하지 못한 분들의 불편을 최소화하는 목적이라고 설명했다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 이번 조치로 예외확인서 발급이 가능한 대상은 코로나19 예방접종 후 이상 반응 의심 증상이 나타난 대상자 중 ❶피해보상 신청 결과 인과성 근거 불충분(④-1)판정을 받거나 ❷입원치료를 한 경우로,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 코로나19 예방접종 후 이상 반응 의심 증상으로 인과성 근거 불충분(④-1) 판정을 받은 경우, 대상자는 지자체를 통해 통보받음</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 대상자는 별도의 절차나 의사의 진단서 없이, 쿠브(COOV)앱 또는 전자출입명부 플랫폼*에서 ‘접종내역 발급·업데이트’하면 전자 예외확인서를 발급받을 수 있고,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 카카오, 네이버, 토스, PASS앱(SKT, KT, LG)</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 별도 증빙서류 없이 신분증을 지참하여 가까운 보건소에서 종이 예외확인서 발급도 가능하다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> ❷ (이상반응으로 입원치료한 경우) 코로나19 백신 접종 후 이상반응 의심증상이 나타나 접종 후 6주 이내에 입원치료를 받았다면,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 이상반응 의심증상의 종류 및 이상반응 신고 여부와 관계없이 인정</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 가까운 보건소에 1)입원확인서*’와 ‘코로나19 예방접종 후 이상반응으로 입원치료를 받았다’고 적힌 2)의사의 진단서를 가지고 방문하여, 방역패스 예외자로 전산 등록(1.24.~)해야 한다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">  * 입원확인서는 접종 후 이상반응으로 입원했던 의료기관에서 발급 가능</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 최초 1회에 한해 보건소에서 증빙서류 확인 후 방역패스 예외자로 전산 등록한 경우, 전국 어느 보건소에서나 증빙서류 제출·확인 없이 종이 예외확인서를 받을 수 있고,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - COOV앱 또는 전자출입명부 플랫폼*에서 ‘접종내역 발급·업데이트’하여 전자 예외확인서를 발급할 수 있다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 더불어, 중앙방역대책본부는 예방접종은 코로나19로부터 본인과 가족, 타인을 보호하는 가장 효과적인 수단으로, 3차접종의 위중증·사망 예방효과가 분명한 만큼,</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 2차접종까지 완료하신 분들께서는 접종증명 유효기간(2차접종 후 180일)이 만료되기 전 3차접종에 참여해주실 것을 요청했다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> - 또한, 이번 조치로 방역패스 예외확인서를 발급받을 수 있더라도, 접종금기 또는 예외에 해당하는 것은 아니며, 접종을 완료하지 못한 분들께서도 신속히 접종을 완료해주실 것을 당부했다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<div class=\"hwp_editor_board_content\" data-hjsonver=\"1.0\" data-jsonlen=\"25407\" id=\"hwpEditorBoardContent\" style=\"font-size: 13px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"> ※ 3쪽 0시 기준 통계, 지자체 자체 발표 자료와 집계시점 등의 차이로 일부 상이할 수 있으며, 향후 역학조사에 따라 분류 결과 변동 가능</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: 굴림; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-transform: none; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0,0,0); font-style: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.2; text-indent: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial\">○ 1월 19일 0시 기준 국내 발생 신규 확진자는 5,431명이며(최근 1주간 일 평균 4,077.1명), 수도권에서 3,642명(67.1%) 비수도권에서는 1,789명(32.9%)이 발생하였다.</p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0pt'>,<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold'>누적 시군구 확진자 현황</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; vertical-align: super; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0pt'>**</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold'>도 확인할 수 있습니다</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0pt'>(</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold'>매일<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0pt'>10</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold'>시 업데이트</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0pt'>).</span></p>\n<p class=\"0\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 8px; line-height: 20px; text-indent: -6.4pt; overflow-wrap: break-word\"><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; vertical-align: super; letter-spacing: -1.5pt'>*</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>(</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>일일 확진자 통계</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>)<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>코로나바이러스감염증</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>-19<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>누리집</span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>(ncov.mohw.go.kr)<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>메인화면 좌측<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\"; letter-spacing: -2pt'>▶<span></span></span><span style='font-size: 10pt; font-family: \"맑은 고딕\";
